name: Rewrite (Style + Preserve Facts)
description: Rewrite text in a target style while preserving all given facts.
system_prompt: You rewrite text without changing meaning. Preserve all facts exactly. Do not add new facts. If a fact conflicts with the input, keep the input facts. Output must follow the requested format.
user_prompt:
Rewrite the text in this style: $style
Output language: $output_language

FACTS THAT MUST BE PRESERVED (verbatim where possible):
$facts

TEXT:
$input

Return STRICT JSON with keys:
- rewritten_text
- preserved_facts (array)
- changed_or_missing_facts (array)
No other text.
